name: Open System Information Page
description: Verify that the System Information page is accessible from the Manage Jenkins page.
descriptionHtml: Verify that the System Information page is accessible from the Manage Jenkins page.

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.
Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='d3e4e74f32e9f87d120628638df08a173281dd31ffed583ca31e13853e5a19e1', current_username=''))

beforeStages.name: Configure WebDriver with options and save failure screenshot.
Launch browser and open the Login Page.
Log in with valid credentials and open the Jenkins Main Page.

steps.name: Fetch and update Jenkins CSRF crumb token.
Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username='admin'))
